quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Confucius

quote: When it is obvious that the goals cannot be reached, don’t adjust the goals, adjust the action steps.
author: Confucius

quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
author: Confucius

quote: The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
author: Confucius

quote: Real knowledge is to know the extent of one’s ignorance.
author: Confucius

quote: I hear and I forget. I see and I remember. I do and I understand.
author: Confucius

quote: The superior man is modest in his speech, but exceeds in his actions.
author: Confucius

quote: Before you embark on a journey of revenge, dig two graves.
author: Confucius

quote: Respect yourself and others will respect you.
author: Confucius

quote: To see what is right and not do it is the want of courage.
author: Confucius

quote: Silence is a true friend who never betrays.
author: Confucius

quote: The strength of a nation derives from the integrity of the home.
author: Confucius

quote: Ignorance is the night of the mind, but a night without moon and star.
author: Confucius

quote: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.
author: Confucius

quote: Virtue is not left to stand alone. He who practices it will have neighbors.
author: Confucius

quote: What you do not want done to yourself, do not do to others.
author: Confucius

quote: The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential… these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.
author: Confucius

quote: To be wronged is nothing, unless you continue to remember it.
author: Confucius

quote: The more man meditates upon good thoughts, the better will be his world and the world at large.
author: Confucius

quote: Study the past if you would define the future.
author: Confucius

quote: The man who asks a question is a fool for a minute, the man who does not ask is a fool for life.
author: Confucius

quote: Learning without thought is labor lost; thought without learning is perilous.
author: Confucius

quote: Wisdom, compassion, and courage are the three universally recognized moral qualities of men.
author: Confucius

quote: The superior man thinks always of virtue; the common man thinks of comfort.
author: Confucius

quote: The superior man understands what is right; the inferior man understands what will sell.
author: Confucius

quote: Do not impose on others what you yourself do not desire.
author: Confucius

quote: If you make a mistake and do not correct it, this is called a mistake.
author: Confucius

quote: Isn’t it a pleasure to study and practice what you have learned?
author: Confucius

quote: A gentleman would be ashamed should his deeds not match his words.
author: Confucius

quote: Reviewing what you have learned and learning anew, you are fit to be a teacher.
author: Confucius

quote: He who learns but does not think, is lost! He who thinks but does not learn is in great danger.
author: Confucius

quote: Without feelings of respect, what is there to distinguish men from beasts?
author: Confucius

quote: Learning without reflection is a waste. Reflection without learning is dangerous.
author: Confucius

quote: In a country well governed, poverty is something to be ashamed of. In a country badly governed, wealth is something to be ashamed of.
author: Confucius

quote: Better a diamond with a flaw than a pebble without.
author: Confucius

quote: To see and listen to the wicked is already the beginning of wickedness.
author: Confucius

quote: When anger rises, think of the consequences.
author: Confucius

quote: By nature, men are nearly alike; by practice, they get to be wide apart.
author: Confucius

quote: Only the wisest and stupidest of men never change.
author: Confucius

quote: The superior man is distressed by his lack of ability, not by the failure of others to recognize his ability.
author: Confucius

quote: Men’s natures are alike; it is their habits that carry them far apart.
author: Confucius

quote: He who speaks without modesty will find it difficult to make his words good.
author: Confucius

quote: Music produces a kind of pleasure which human nature cannot do without.
author: Confucius

quote: You cannot open a book without learning something.
author: Confucius

quote: The gem cannot be polished without friction, nor man perfected without trials.
author: Confucius

quote: Roads were made for journeys, not destinations.
author: Confucius

quote: Act with kindness but do not expect gratitude.
author: Confucius

quote: Never contract friendship with a man that is not better than thyself.
author: Confucius

quote: Success depends upon previous preparation, and without such preparation there is sure to be failure.
author: Confucius

quote: To know what is right and not do it is the worst cowardice.
author: Confucius

quote: A youth is to be regarded with respect. How do we know that his future will not be equal to our present?
author: Confucius

quote: Humility is the solid foundation of all virtues.
author: Confucius

quote: Sincerity and truth are the basis of every virtue.
author: Confucius

quote: If you look into your own heart, and you find nothing wrong there, what is there to worry about?
author: Confucius
